Package displays

Class selectListener

java.lang.Object
displays.selectListener
public class selectListener extends Object
Since every display utilizes selection listeners, this separate class with the method 'selectListenCreation()' is used to add a selection listener instead of each display doing it locally.
Author:
Jonathan Houge

  • Method Details

    • selectListenCreation

      public static void selectListenCreation(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button button, ArrayList<String> decision)
      Selection listener for radio buttons and submit buttons. Utilized by every display (other than the chessboard) in an effort to reduce code.
      Parameters:
      button - : the button that the listener is being applied to
      decision - : the arraylist that'll keep track of button results
